title: Trusting Who We Are (retreat talk)
itunes:title: Trusting Who We Are (retreat talk)
description: Trusting Who We Are (retreat talk) - When we are suffering, we are believing something untrue - usually a limiting story about who we are. This talk explores the roots of our self-doubts, and the teachings and practices that remind us of our basic goodness - the loving awareness that is our source.
